thread.title: Transaero Airlines Continues To Renew Its Aircraft FleetTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Transaero Airlines Continues To Renew Its Aircraft FleetTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Transaero Airlines Continues To Renew Its Aircraft FleetTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Transaero Airlines Continues To Renew Its Aircraft Fleet
Transaero Airlines today took delivery of its second Airbus A321 aircraft under the operating leasing agreement between the airline and ICBC Leasing.
The aircraft can accommodate 184 passengers. It features 8 seats in Business class and 176 seats in Economy class. The airline plans to operate the A321 aircraft on the high demand medium-range routes.
Transaero continues to optimize its aircraft fleet under its Business Enhancement Programme and Fleet Renewal Programme. Transaero’s fleet is being expanded with new fuel efficient aircraft with optimal passenger capacity for the current market conditions. The airline will also withdraw from its fleet the aircraft of lower demand in the current economic conditions.
By the end of 2015 two more Airbus A321 aircraft will join Transaero’s fleet in addition to the two Airbus A321 and one Boeing 737-800 received earlier this year. At the same time, Transaero withdraws widebody aircraft from its fleet, which are of twice passenger capacity over the passenger capacity of the new arriving aircraft.
In line with the airline’s strategy, the fleet optimization will allow to enhance the quality of Transaero’s fleet and reduce its operating costs.
Source:- Transaero Airlines
